column2: Dawn Davis-Lenoir, 25-34 Female  on Treatment for 1 to less than 2 years (Patient)
column9: It is nice that I don't have to worry about taking a pill everyday.....BUT I had mood swings when I was near that time of the month! It is not worth my sanity!

column2: w.k., 13-18 Female  on Treatment for 6 months to less than 1 year (Patient)
column9: I Was on this medication for about 9 maybe 10 months and i didnt like it at all. i was moody all the time. and i gained so much weight.. i started eating less, but i felt bloated and hungry all the time. and i just felt everything i would eat i gained weight. i constantly bled for 9months straight on the shot. i personally did not like the depo provera, and will never get it again.

column2: meganm, 19-24 Female  on Treatment for 2 to less than 5 years (Patient)
column9: I have been on this contraceptive because my period lasted for for 13 months and I think its the best birth control out there!

column2: cajuntink, 13-18 Female  on Treatment for 1 to less than 2 years (Patient)
column9: I love this birth control method. I feel great i have no problems wit it and it works. sure, yeah you'll gain a little weight but thats your responsiblity to keep your weight down dont blame the drug. and i barely have a period which is what i love most and the fact i cant get pregnant(but always use condoms no matter what). Otherwise its a great drug, use it. :)

column2: 25-34 Female  on Treatment for 5 to less than 10 years (Patient)
column9: I was on the shot a few years ago...never had any problems no bleeding that lasted for months nothing....I got off of it and had my 3rd son and then got back on it....I never did lose all my baby weight and by being on the shot now seems like I'm having the hardest time ever to lose a pound. Of course mydoctor told me thatif I can control my urges I will not have a problem with gaining any weight. Gotta learn self control....Other then that I love it!!! I do ge my period around the week before my next shot it's not heavt at all and lats for about 3 days....

column2: 19-24 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: I had horrible mood swings a constant heavy flow period for 4 weeks straight and the cramps were not worth the convience...dont do it girls!!

column2: 25-34 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: I took one dose of this, which lasts for three months.  In the last three months I have had more problems than ever before.  I have had major emotional/mood swings, acne problems and breakthrough bleeding that has lasted over 35 days.  I called my dr. after a month and a half and demanded to be put on something different.  I will never again use a drug that lasts for three months and I have no control over!  Do Not Use This!

column2: 35-44 Female  on Treatment for 5 to less than 10 years (Patient)
column9: I was on this for 10 years. I only stopped because my husdand has ED with no real help in sight in the near future. I had no periods for 10 years. I loved it. I could not justify spending to money any more. I never thought about it ever.
switched from lybrel to depo.spotted for two weeks. nothing major. haven't had any side effects. this drug affects everybody differently as with any drug.

column2: me, 19-24 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: Tried this a few years ago.  Spotted for the whole three months.  NEVER again will I try something I can't stop at will...you can't take the injection back out!

column2: 25-34 Female  on Treatment for 1 to less than 2 years (Patient)
